MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA16 postcode area of Knutsford, affecting properties in Ollerton, Over Peover and the surrounding area. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:30 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:24 pm on 28th December, 2020.
